name: epsibot
description: Light discord bot for epsilon needs

scripts.about:check: echo 'Check that your code is good by running eslint'
scripts.check: eslint src/ && echo 'All good, no problem found'
scripts.about:build: echo 'Will compile the .ts files to .js and put them in built/'
scripts.build: rm -rf built/ && npm run check && tsc && echo 'Build finished'
scripts.start: npm run build && node --enable-source-maps -r dotenv/config built/main.js
scripts.about:clean: echo 'Clean your directory by deleting build/ and logs/'
scripts.about:fix: echo 'Fix everyting it can in your code (like missing semicolons)'
scripts.about:migrate: echo 'Will execute all migrations, creating the DB if needed'
scripts.about:start:builded: echo 'Will start Epsibot without rebuilding it'
scripts.test: echo 'Sorry, there is no tests for now'

author: EpsiTeam
